siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, This week we talk about Stan’s Vacation to Traverse City. He seems to have a restful time and even has a review of a milkshake IPA. We’re wondering if Deaconess Longmire listens to the podcast. Stan must have been relaxed because he did some coding for fun! Jon’s…

frontmatter.title: Back from Vacation and Talking Tech
